definition: (lit.) to get shot even when lying down/(fig.) to get unjustly ridiculed, attacked, implicated in sth etc while just being present (Internet slang)/abbr. to 躺槍|躺枪[tang3 qiang1]
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
lit. rarely seen, very strange (idiom); to express amazement due to lack of experience/naive expression of excitement due to ignorance
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction
lit. either the fish dies or the net splits/a life and death struggle (idiom)
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: bearer of ill luck/person with the evil eye/comet
what remains unseen is deemed to be clean/what the eye doesn't see, the heart doesn't grieve over (idiom)
